Detailed Description

This class exposes the CubeMap render of the environment.

void EnvironmentCubeMap::numberOfFacesPerFrame ( uint8  numberOfFaces  ) 

With this method, you can override the default number of faces per frame that it draws, which defaults to 1.

void EnvironmentCubeMap::update ( float  dTime,
bool  defaultNumFaces = true,
uint8  numberOfFaces = 1,
uint32  drawSelection = 0x80000000 
)

This method draws the environment How many faces to draw on this draw call.

Max 6, min 0. If 1, it will update each face in turn, one per frame. If -1, it will draw the N faces, where N is configurable below.
